backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a dating app backend with profile management, match decisions, messaging (including image support), and photo posts, using access control and blob storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that upgrades the actor state by adding an optional `image` field (defaulting to null) to all existing messages in the nested message map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping three chat image features (upload button, inline display with lightbox, loading/disabled state) to their implementing file `ChatView.tsx` with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated summary document listing short descriptions of every frontend source file, covering pages, components, hooks, and utilities in the React app.
frontend/index.css: Root CSS file importing Tailwind directives and defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes including sidebar and chart tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point titled 'Match Connect' that mounts the React app into a `#root` div and loads `src/main.tsx` as an ES module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that configures TanStack Router with routes for landing, browse, matches, profile, messages, chat, and feed pages, and conditionally shows a profile setup modal for new authenticated users.
frontend/src/components/ChatThemePanel.t: Slide-out Sheet panel component for customizing chat appearance, offering preset theme selection with visual previews and font size controls via the `useChatTheme` hook.
frontend/src/components/ChatView.tsx: Full-featured chat view component that displays a conversation with a partner, supports sending text and image messages (up to 1.5MB), marks messages as read, and applies customizable chat themes.
frontend/src/components/CreatePostForm.t: Form component for creating a photo post with an optional caption, handling image selection (up to 10MB), upload progress tracking, and submission via the createPhotoPost mutation.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: App shell component providing a sticky header with navigation links (Browse, Matches, Messages, Feed, Profile), Internet Identity login/logout, and a responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/MatchCard.tsx: Displays a matched user's profile card showing their avatar initial, name, age, bio, and up to three interest tags, fetching data by Principal.
frontend/src/components/ProfileCard.tsx: Swipeable profile card for the browse/matching flow that shows a user's details and lets the current user like or pass with animated transitions.
frontend/src/components/ProfileForm.tsx: Form for creating or editing a user profile with fields for display name, age, bio, and a dynamic interests list, saving via the saveCallerUserProfile mutation.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog that wraps ProfileForm and is shown on first login to guide new users through initial profile creation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using React Query, supporting both anonymous and authenticated (Internet Identity) usage, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useChatTheme.ts: Custom hook that manages per-user chat theme settings (preset themes, custom colors, font size) persisted to localStorage, with resolved color/background values and update callbacks.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status via a React context backed by DFINITY's AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend interactions including user profiles, match decisions, interests, messages, and photo posts, wrapping actor calls with loading and caching logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that sets up Tailwind CSS, defines light/dark CSS custom properties for the design system, and adds entrance animations for chat messages and conversation items.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/BrowsePage.tsx: Page component that displays swipeable user profiles for discovery, filtering out the current user and already-matched profiles, with loading and empty-state handling.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Displays a social feed of posts from mutual matches, with a PostCard component showing profile info, image, and caption. Includes a dialog for creating new posts and redirects unauthenticated users to the landing page.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Marketing landing page with a hero section, feature highlights, and a login/browse CTA button using Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/pages/MatchesPage.tsx: Shows a grid of profiles the authenticated user has liked, fetched from their match list. Redirects unauthenticated users and displays an empty state with a browse prompt if no likes exist.
frontend/src/pages/MessagesPage.tsx: Lists all conversations with mutual matches, showing avatar, last message, unread count, and timestamp per ConversationItem. Redirects unauthenticated users and displays an empty state if no matches exist.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Profile creation/editing page that loads the authenticated user's existing profile and renders a ProfileForm. Redirects unauthenticated users to the landing page.
frontend/src/utils/chatThemes.ts: Defines the ChatTheme interface and exports an array of four preset chat themes (Pastel Dream, Night Sky, Sunset Glow, Mint Fresh) with colors, backgrounds, and emoji, plus a default theme.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the frontend, extending the default theme with custom OKLCH-based color tokens (including rose, pink, sidebar, chart colors), dark mode support, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata for 'Match Connect', a WhatsApp-style messaging app, tracking existing features (image upload, inline display, loading indicator) and pending feature requests (backend Base64 image payload support) with schema versioning.
